error.lon: The supplied latitude does not fall between -180 y 180 degrees

user.description: Confirm your geographical position.  This will be used to guess the closest real-time weather station and approximate your postal code for forecasts.

user_three.description: The real-time weather station is used to look up the current weather.  https://rudd-o.com/meteostations lists the stations.
